text: Isaac Lawrence Milliken (August 29, 1815 - December 2, 1885) was an American politician who was mayor of Chicago, Illinois from 1854 to 1855. He was a member of the Democratic Party. Milliken was born on August 29, 1815 in Saco, Maine.Milliken biography page at Chicago Public Library He was raised in Chicago, Illinois. Milliken died on December 2, 1885 in Chicago, Illinois from an illness, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== *Inaugural Address Category:1815 births Category:1885 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Chicago Category:Burials at Rosehill Cemetery Category:Mayors of Chicago Category:Politicians from Maine Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Isaac Lawrence Milliken
